program_details.description: UNNES stands for the Universitas Negeri Semarang (UNNES). It is a government-funded university located in Semarang, Central Java, Indonesia. The University was founded in 1965. The applications are open for the UNNES NEXTSHIP Scholarship 2024. The scholarship is available to pursue Undergraduate, Master, and Doctoral Degree programs available at UNNES. Securing a scholarship in Indonesia is easy. I have also created a list of BS MS PhD Scholarships in Indonesia.

financial_coverage: Dormitory Fee for Masters and PhD students
Living Allowance for Masters and PhD students

waiver_conditions: Applicants from English-speaking countries do not need English Proficiency Test results.

age.maximum: 25 years old for undergrads, 35 years for masters, and 40 years for PhD students.

additional_conditions: Provide a Letter of Recommendation from the Indonesian Embassy, from the employer/direct supervisor, and previous schools.
Provide proof of citizenship such as a passport. (ID card is not acceptable)

required_documents: Letter of Recommendation from the Indonesian Embassy, from the employer/direct supervisor, and previous schools.
proof of citizenship such as a passport
application_process: Read all the requirements and the guidelines.
Click on Apply now and continue the online application process.

related_programs: UM ISS Scholarship 2024 in Indonesia (Fully Funded Scholarship)
University of Jambi Scholarship 2024 in Indonesia (Fully Funded)
